## Describe the Bug

A clear description of what the bug is.

## To Reproduce

Steps to reproduce:

1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '...'
3. See error

## Expected Behavior

What you expected to happen.

## Actual Behavior

What actually happened.

## Screenshots

If applicable, add screenshots.

## Environment

- Browser: [e.g. Chrome 120]
- OS: [e.g. macOS 14.0]
- Node version: [e.g. 20.0.0]

## Additional Context

Any other info about the problem.
